this_title: Unfiltered: The Story Behind the Rivalry
introduction: is the first behind-the-scenes documentary on the sport of swimming. Unfiltered goes beyond the pool and provides an unprecedented inside look at the lives, friendship, and rivalry of Michael Phelps and Ian Crocker. While following Phelps and Crocker for the critical 4-month period between the 2005 World Championship Trials and World Championships, Unfiltered delves into the athletes’ personal lives to explore what drives these distinctly different people in their similar desire to win.
chinese_title: Unfiltered: The Story Behind the Rivalry
